wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Markby, KCIE (31 May 1829 – 15 October 1914) was an English judge and legal writer.

response: He was born in Aberdour, Scotland, the son of Andrew Beatson Bell, who was Sheriff-Substitute of Fife. He studied at Edinburgh Academy and Balliol College, Oxford, under the tutelage of Sir William Markby.
